title: How do people only spend 50-100 dollars a month on audio equipment lol
body:
Maybe it's the culture, I have very fragile ears so my parents often time buy these for me.

https://am23.akamaized.net/tms/cnt/uploads/gallery/funny-amazon-reviews/audioquest-k2-terminated-speaker-cable-ust-plugs-8-2-44m-pair.png

my parents buys it I can't afford it

---

cost of listening at some of the iPods.
This is a very typical cost for a cable of eight feet, like if you're listening with your relatives

https://i0.wp.com/www.skeptical-science.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/01/Amazon_com__AudioQuest_K2_Terminated_Speaker_Cable_-_UST_2_44_m_Plugs_8__Pair__Discontinued_by_Manufacturer___Electronics.jpg

if you talk to the manufacturers of this cable, small talk. They will point out the obvious to you this is already cheap considering what's in this insulation sheathing. Since you're getting the best audio quality instead of stabbing your eardrums
